data.description_nl: De Europese primeur van de PATIO Air-5 tenttrailer. Deze Zuid-Koreaanse alleskunner laat zien dat het ook anders kan. Te zien op de stand van TentVent.
data.description_en: The European premiere of the PATIO Air-5 tent trailer. This South Korean all-rounder shows that things can be done differently. See it at the TentVent booth.
data.description_de: The European premiere of the PATIO Air-5 tent trailer. This South Korean all-rounder shows that things can be done differently. See it at the TentVent booth.

data.description_nl: In samenwerking met de VW Bus Club Nederland kun je een aantal unieke Syncro's aanschouwen. 40 jaar Volkswagen 4x4 historie!
data.description_en: In collaboration with VW Bus Club Nederland, you can see several unique Syncros. 40 years of Volkswagen 4x4 history!
data.description_de: In collaboration with VW Bus Club Nederland, you can see several unique Syncros. 40 years of Volkswagen 4x4 history!

data.description_nl: Geweldige baan waar met RC auto's gereden kan worden. Heb je zelf een auto? Neem hem mee! Geen auto? Ook proberen kan!
data.description_en: Great track where you can drive RC cars. Have your own car? Bring it along! No car? You can still try!
data.description_de: Great track where you can drive RC cars. Have your own car? Bring it along! No car? You can still try!

data.description_nl: Speciale 4x4 Vakantiebeurs Jubileum-toertocht, uitgezet door de Allroad Commissie. Exclusief voor LRCH leden.
data.description_en: Special 4x4 Holiday Fair Anniversary tour, organized by the Allroad Committee. Exclusive for LRCH members.
data.description_de: Special 4x4 Holiday Fair Anniversary tour, organized by the Allroad Committee. Exclusive for LRCH members.

data.description_nl: Ga zelf met jouw 4x4 het terrein in! GRATIS voor leden van de LRCH. Niet-leden betalen €20,-
data.description_en: Drive your own 4x4 offroad! FREE for LRCH members. Non-members pay €20
data.description_de: Drive your own 4x4 offroad! FREE for LRCH members. Non-members pay €20

data.description_nl: Nieuwe leden worden wegwijs gemaakt binnen de club. Ontmoet bestuursleden en leer over commissies en evenementen.
data.description_en: New members get acquainted with the club. Meet board members and learn about committees and events.
data.description_de: New members get acquainted with the club. Meet board members and learn about committees and events.

data.description_nl: Vliegclub Nimbus geeft spectaculaire demonstraties met radiografisch bestuurde watervliegtuigen.
data.description_en: Flying Club Nimbus gives spectacular demonstrations with radio-controlled seaplanes.
data.description_de: Flying Club Nimbus gives spectacular demonstrations with radio-controlled seaplanes.

data.description_nl: Internationaal initiatief om kleinschalig Land Rover meetings te organiseren onder het genot van 'a cup of tea'. Met deelname uit de UK!
data.description_en: International initiative to organize small-scale Land Rover meetings while enjoying 'a cup of tea'. With participants from the UK!
data.description_de: International initiative to organize small-scale Land Rover meetings while enjoying 'a cup of tea'. With participants from the UK!

data.title_en: Ride Along in Land Rover Defender
data.description_nl: Omnivents 4x4 laat jouw droom in vervulling gaan! Stap in en rijd mee in het offroad parcours.
data.description_en: Omnivents 4x4 makes your dream come true! Get in and ride along on the offroad course.
data.title_de: Ride Along in Land Rover Defender
data.description_de: Omnivents 4x4 makes your dream come true! Get in and ride along on the offroad course.

data.description_nl: Laat je verrassen en beleef magische momenten met Tim Horsting! Bekend van TV.
data.description_en: Be amazed and experience magical moments with Tim Horsting! Known from TV.
data.description_de: Be amazed and experience magical moments with Tim Horsting! Known from TV.

data.description_nl: Feestvreugde op het beursterrein met ontspannen lounge en uptempo disco klassiekers!
data.description_en: Party vibes at the fairgrounds with relaxed lounge and uptempo disco classics!
data.description_de: Party vibes at the fairgrounds with relaxed lounge and uptempo disco classics!

data.description_nl: Voor het eerst in Nederland te zien: de BruderX! Dé offroad caravan uit Australië. Te zien op de stand van Camp-Impuls.
data.description_en: For the first time in the Netherlands: the BruderX! The offroad caravan from Australia. See it at the Camp-Impuls booth.
data.description_de: For the first time in the Netherlands: the BruderX! The offroad caravan from Australia. See it at the Camp-Impuls booth.

data.description_nl: De beurs is de gehele dag geopend voor publiek. Bezoek de ruim 80 standhouders en doe inspiratie op voor jouw volgende 4x4 avontuur.
data.description_en: The fair is open all day to the public. Visit over 80 exhibitors and get inspired for your next 4x4 adventure.
data.description_de: The fair is open all day to the public. Visit over 80 exhibitors and get inspired for your next 4x4 adventure.
